duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing facilities maintenance functions including mechanical, electrical, plumbing, and HVAC systems to ensure optimal operating results.
Coordinating routine maintenance and timely repairs in various areas such as painting, carpentry, and plumbing.
Oversight of vendor activities and monitoring progress to ensure quality of work.
Constant attention to life safety issues and ensuring building emergency systems are operational.
Inspecting and providing oversight of janitorial/cleaning service and ensuring consistent maintenance.
Assisting with administrative tasks for Mailroom and Maintenance staff and supporting special projects with outside vendors.
Increasing the efficiency of the Facilities staff by providing cost-saving ideas and new ways to provide more effective services to customers.
Maintaining spreadsheet of door/office keys and inventory, and assisting in the coordination of individual and large-scale cubical moves.
Reviewing vendor billing, purchase orders for processing and payment, and assisting with preparing the Facilities Maintenance Department Fiscal Year Expense Budget.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma /GED or vocational school training, plus 5 years of experience in a maintenance or facilities related position.
